remarks: A companion rule to ax-gen, valid only if an individual exists.  Unlike ~ ax-6 , it does not require equality on its interface.  Some fundamental theorems of predicate logic can be proven from ~ ax-gen , ~ ax-4 and this theorem alone, not requiring ~ ax-7 or excessive distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 12-Nov-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 9-Dec-2017.)
statement:
exiftru.1 $e |- ph $.
exiftru $p |- E. x ph $.
